# sitecore_cm_client (Resource)

Manages a Sitecore CM automation client



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `environment_id` (String) The environment ID for the CM client
- `name` (String) The name of the CM client
- `project_id` (String) The project ID for the CM client

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the CM client

### Read-Only

- `client_id` (String) The client ID for authentication
- `client_secret` (String, Sensitive) The client secret for authentication
- `id` (String) The ID of the CM client
